name: Sapphire 2
description: While you defend, if you are focused, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: “Wampa”
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to roll 1 additional attack die. After defending, lose 1 [Charge].

name: “Deathfire”
description: After you are destroyed, before you are removed, you may perform an attack and drop or launch 1 device.

name: “Deathfire”
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may spend 2 [Charge] to drop or launch a bomb using the (3 [Straight]) template.

name: “Double Edge”
description: After you perform a [Turret] or [Missile] attack that misses, you may perform a bonus attack using a different weapon.

name: Nash Windrider
description: During the Engagement Phase, after a friendly small ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship has not engaged this phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship engages at the current initiative.

name: “Night Beast”
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may perform a [Focus] action.

name: Scythe 6
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: “Vagabond”
description: After you fully execute a maneuver using your Adaptive Ailerons, if you are not stressed, you may drop 1 device.

name: “Vizier”
description: After you move using your Controlled Ailerons ship ability, you may perform a [Coordinate] action. If you do, skip your Perform Action step.

name: Captain Dobbs
description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc and are not ionized, you may gain 1 ion token to cancel 1 [Hit] result.

name: Captain Feroph
description: While you defend, if the attacker does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or [Focus] results to an [Evade] result.

name: Captain Hark
description: After you reveal a [0 [Stationary]] maneuver, if you are equipped with Swivel Wings (Down), you must execute a [1 [Bank Left]] or [1 [Bank Right]] sideslip maneuver of the same difficulty instead. After you execute that maneuver, you must flip Swivel Wings (Down).

name: Captain Oicunn
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 0, treat it as an attack at attack range 1.

name: Colonel Jendon
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, while friendly ships acquire locks this round, they must acquire locks beyond range 3 instead of at range 0-3.

name: Gar Saxon
description: When a friendly unit at range 0-2 performs a primary attack, if the attacker is in the defender's [Rear Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 additional die.

name: Lieutenant Hebsly
description: After you defend, you may perform a red [Boost] action, even while stressed.

name: Lieutenant Karsabi
description: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

name: Lieutenant Karsabi
description: When you perform a [Reload] action, the chosen upgrade recovers 1 additional [Charge].

name: Lieutenant Lorrir
description: While you barrel roll, you must use the [[Bank Left] or [Bank Right]] template instead of the [[Straight]] template.

name: Lieutenant Sai
description: After you a perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you chose performed an action on your action bar, you may perform that action.

name: Lyttan Dree
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if you are in the defender's [Left Arc] or [Right Arc], the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Magna Tolvan
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform white actions, even while stressed. After you gain a stress token, you may perform a white action, if able.

name: Maus Monare
description: After you perform an [Evade] action, gain a calculate token

name: Scimitar 1
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Valen Rudor
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends (after damage is resolved, if any), you may perform an action.

name: Yrica Quell
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc].

name: Zertik Strom
description: During the End Phase, you may spend a lock you have on an enemy ship to expose 1 of that ship's damage cards.

name: Captain Jonus
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, that ship may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Captain Jonus
description: After you drop or launch a device, gain an evade token.

name: Captain Kagi
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 or more friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, transfer all enemy lock tokens from the chosen ships to you.

name: Captain Yorr
description: After you perform a primary attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a bonus [Cannon] attack.

name: Colonel Vessery
description: While you perform an attack against a locked ship, after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Commandant Goran
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 with a lower initiative than yours partially executes a maneuver, it may perform a red [Focus] action.

name: “Countdown”
description: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.

name: Countess Ryad
description: While you would execute a [Straight] maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, execute it as a [Koiogran Turn] maneuver instead.

name: “Deathrain”
description: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action.

name: Del Meeko
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends against a damaged attacker, the defender may reroll 1 defense die.

name: “Echo”
description: While you decloak, you must use the [2 [Bank Left]] or [2 [Bank Right]] template instead of the [2 [Straight]] template.

name: “Echo”
description: After an enemy ship at range 0-1 performs an action on its action bar, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform the same action, treating it as white.

name: Gideon Hask
description: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Iden Versio
description: Before a friendly TIE at range 0-1 would suffer damage, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

name: Iden Versio
description: Before a friendly TIE/ln fighter at range 0-1 would suffer 1 or more damage, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent that damage.

name: ISB Jingoist
description: Before you engage, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 deplete or strain token of your choice unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

name: Lieutenant Kestal
description: While you perform an attack, after the defender rolls defense dice, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank/[Focus] results.

name: Major Rhymer
description: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-3.

name: Major Rhymer
description: While you perform a [Torpedo] attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], change 1 [Focus] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: Major Vermeil
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

name: Major Vynder
description: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Major Vynder
description: After you perform a [Missile] attack, you may perform a bonus [Cannon] attack. While you perform this bonus attack, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result.

name: Moff Gideon
description: While an enemy ship at range 1-3 defends, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend 1 [Charge] and choose a friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, defense dice cannot be modified during this attack and the chosen friendly ship gains 1 strain token.

name: Morna Kee
description: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to flip 1 of your reinforce tokens to your other full arc instead of removing it.

name: “Pure Sabacc”
description: While you perform an attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: “Rampage”
description: After you execute a speed 3-4 maneuver, you may choose a ship in your [Single Turret Arc] at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 strain token, or 2 strain tokens if you are damaged.

name: Scimitar 3
description: After you drop a bomb, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action.

name: Seyn Marana
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Critical Hit] result. If you do, deal 1 facedown damage card to the defender, then cancel your remaining results.

name: Sigma 4
description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] action, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action.

name: Sigma 5
description: After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an [Evade] action.

name: Sigma 6
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [SLAM] action.

name: Sigma 7
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 0-1.

name: Turr Phennir
description: After you perform an attack, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, even if you are stressed.

name: Ved Foslo
description: While you execute a maneuver, you may execute a maneuver of the same bearing and difficulty of a speed 1 higher or lower instead.

name: “Backstabber”
description: While you perform a primary attack, if a friendly Darth Vader or “Mauler” Mithel is in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] at range 0-1, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: “Duchess”
description: You may choose not to use your Adaptive Ailerons. You may use your Adaptive Ailerons even while stressed.

name: Flight Leader Ubbel
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if it was dealt a damage card, you may perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

name: “Howlrunner”
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Juno Eclipse
description: After you perform an action, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

name: Maarek Stele
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender would be dealt a faceup damage card, instead draw 3 damage cards, choose 1, and discard the rest.

name: Major Mianda
description: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 2 friendly small ships at range 0-2. You and the chosen ships may perform a red [Barrel Roll] or red [Boost] action.

name: “Mauler” Mithel
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: “Mauler” Mithel
description: While you perform a primary attack, if a friendly Darth Vader or “Backstabber” is in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] at range 0-1, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
description: While you perform an attack, if you are reinforced and the defender is in the [Full Front Arc] or [Full Rear Arc] matching your reinforce token, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

name: “Redline”
description: You can maintain up to 2 locks. After you perform an action, you may acquire a lock.

name: Rexler Brath
description: After you perform an attack that hits, if you are evading, expose 1 of the defender's damage cards.

name: “Scourge” Skutu
description: While you perform an attack against a defender in your [Bullseye Arc], roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Tomax Bren
description: After you perform a [Reload] action, you may recover 1 [Charge] token on 1 of your equipped [Talent] upgrade cards.

name: Tomax Bren
description: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] action, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, gain a focus token.

name: Vult Skerris
description: Action: Gain 1 strain token to recover 1 [Charge]. Before you engage, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform an action.

name: “Whisper”
description: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 evade token.

name: “Whisper”
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Cloak] action.

name: Ciena Ree
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, gain 1 stress token. After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, remove 1 stress token.

name: Colonel Jendon
description: While you defend, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 of your blank results to a [Focus] result.

name: “Dark Curse”
description: While you defend, the attacker's dice cannot be modified.

name: Soontir Fel
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain 1 focus token.

name: Soontir Fel
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 deplete token to boost or barrel roll.
